sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Productdetails() { const [data,Setdata]=useState(null) const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API + '/v1/products/getsingleproduct/'+id) .then(res=>res.json()) .then((res)=>Setdata(res.product)) },[]) return ( data &&

{data.name}

Product {data._id}

${data.price}

- +

Status: In Stock

Description:

{data.description}

Sold by: Amazon

); }
